result.execSummary:
The defendant Allan S Brown was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Felony [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: DA has 90 days to prepare/submit order.  To be collected by the Department of Corrections.  Court financial obligations shall be paid at the rate of 25% of the prison wages and work release funds.  Restitution shall be paid pursuant to separate court order.  The balance remaining at release from prison be paid as a condition of extended supervision or parole at a rate determined by the supervising agent.
$250 DNA surcharge and court costs remitted.  $92 VW surcharge  to be paid by the defendant to the Clerk of Courts office within 60 days.
Maintain absolute sobriety.  Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with AS without written permission from agent.
Completion of certified domestic violence treatment.  Defendant advised of requirement to provide DNA sample.

supervisions.notes:
Concur to 15CF2739. Defendant is not eligible for the Challenge Incarceration Program.  Defendant is not eligible for the Substance Abuse Program.
Concurrent with: 15CF2739

superMiscConds.notes: Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with AS and HAK.

Def to take all medications prescribed by treatment physicians.  Defendant shall complete a risk and needs assessment and comply with care plan goals related to prioritized need areas identified.  Any other conditions DOC, Probation/Parole Department may impose.

Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release.
  - Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with Alicia S.
  - Defendant shall not be at 1313 Tempkin Ave.
  - Defendant shall not consume alcohol.
  - The court orders a signature bond on the condition that the defendant reports to and complies with Dane County Bail Monitoring (DCBM).  The defendant shall report to DCBM by 10:00 A.M. on the business day following his/her release from jail.
  If defendant fails to comply with DCBM, cash bail is automatically set in the amount of $500 (per case), as higher cash bail is necessary to assure appearance in court. BMP is removed as condition of bond.
  Defendant waived the time limits for Preliminary Hearing.
